data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 1,647,500 people living in Nawabganj through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Nawabganj, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,064 believers in Nawabganj against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Nawabganj, Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Nawabganj, Rajshahi, Bangladesh know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Baha'i people might believe through him.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,640,494, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,647,500 people living in Nawabganj, Rajshahi, Bangladesh. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Nawabganj that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

location.name: Nawabganj
location.people_groups_list: Dalu, Peshakar, Tirendaj, Mirzakhani, Rajbansi (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Dalu (18,000), Peshakar (1,500), Tirendaj (300), Mirzakhani (7,500), Rajbansi (Muslim traditions) (3,400)
